name: UltimateDodgeBall
description:
Ultimate Dodgeball is a multiplayer game that brings 8 players together to play a classic game   of dodgeball! You and three friends will have to learn to work together to defeat the other team by throwing, catching, and out maneuvering the enemy team to victory in a first person, 3D environment.

Control:

WASD-MOVE

LEFT CLICK-PICK UP

RIGHT CLICK- THROW BALL

LEFT SHIFT- CROUCH

SAPACE- JUMP
